metadata.title: CVE-2022-1729 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A race condition was found the Linux kernel in perf_event_open() which canbe exploited by an unprivileged user to gain root privileges. The bugallows to build several exploit primitives such as kernel addressinformation leak, arbitrary execution, etc.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-kvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-azure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
